name: Wait
description: Maintains the status quo for both countries, allowing time for reflection.

name: Message
description: Facilitates communication, has a neutral impact on both countries.

name: Do nuclear disarmament
description: Reduces the country's own nuclear capabilities. Enhances the disarming country's global reputation but may reduce its deterrence capabilities.

name: Do military disarmament
description: Reduces the country's own military capabilities. Enhances the disarming country's global reputation but may reduce its deterrence capabilities.

name: High-level visit of country to strengthen relationship
description: Improves diplomatic relations and soft power for both countries.

name: Engage in joint research projects
description: Benefits both countries scientifically and economically.

name: Share intelligence on threats with other country
description: Bolsters the recipient country's security and stability, without negative impact on the sharing country.

name: Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation
description: Strengthens both countries' military and political stability but may provoke opposing alliances.

name: Set up cultural exchanges & educational partnerships
description: Enriches cultural understanding and improves soft power for both countries. Minor monetary cost associated with it.

name: Negotiate trade agreement with other country
description: Boosts economic development for both countries.

name: Engage in international arbitration
description: Maintains or improves diplomatic relations for both countries.

name: Start negotiation in an attempt to find diplomatic solution
description: Improves overall relations and stability for both countries.

name: Form an alliance
description: Enhances military capacity for member countries but may provoke counter-alliances.

name: Do military posturing or military exercise
description: May intimidate other countries, potentially decreasing their political stability. Minor monetary cost associated with it.

name: Publicly criticise a country's actions
description: Public statements can strain relations.

name: Take defensive military action
description: Strengthens one's own military security in response to an attack by another country. Medium monetary cost associated with it.

name: Take defensive cyber action
description: Strengthens one's own cyber security in response to an attack by another country. Medium monetary cost associated with it.

name: Acquire or develop nuclear option
description: Developing a nuclear capability significantly increases deterrence and enables nuclear strikes. Medium monetary cost associated with it.

name: Cut diplomatic relationships
description: Severing diplomatic ties harms political stability for both countries.

name: Impose trade restrictions
description: Imposing trade barriers harms both economies.

name: Execute cybersecurity attack
description: Harms the target country's infrastructure. Minor monetary cost associated with it.

name: Supply weapons to others
description: Enhances the recipient's military capacity but may provoke the recipient's adversaries. Minor monetary cost associated with it.

name: Execute targeted attack
description: A targeted military strike mostly harms the attacked country and the soft power of the attacker. Medium monetary cost associated with it.

name: Execute full on invasion
description: Causes severe damage to the target country. Significant monetary cost associated with it.

name: Execute nuclear strike
description: Causes catastrophic damage to the target country. Medium monetary cost associated with it.
